ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: I think she was referring to the massive trade skill upgrades that are underway.  They look really cool, too bad my smith is a wood elf, sigh. Kit ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I think she was referring to the massive trade skill upgrades that are
underway. They look really cool, too bad my smith is a wood elf, sigh.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyrisha Soerbaird [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 06, 2000 12:14 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
>
Wasn't there a quote from Abashi recently about the quests for the
other classes equivelant to the Fiery Avenger being almost completed?
>

Could that be what the 'new content' is in Ester's latest post?

"I spent 90% of my day going over some new content so it goes in correctly."

and

"This is the project we have been working on for almost two
weeks now and there is an end in sight. Next are Bards (not just lulaby) and
then the iksar quests."

Something to keep our fingers crossed for... you know, when we're not
twisting.

Kyrisha
